data.title: London climate: Weather London & temperature by month
data.text:
>>Weather by month // weather averages London

>>Climate graph // Weather by Month London

>>average temperature by month London

>>Weather London

The climate in London is cold and temperate. The rainfall in London is significant, with precipitation even during the driest month. According to Köppen and Geiger, this climate is classified as Dfb. In London, the average annual temperature is 8.6 °C | 47.4 °F. Annually, approximately 1055 mm | 41.5 inch of precipitation descends.

The given location is in the northern hemisphere. -> The particular spot is situated in the upper half of the planet. Summer begins at the end of June and ends in September. The months of summer are: June, July, August, September.

Climate graph // Weather by Month London

The driest month is February. There is 66 mm | 2.6 inch of precipitation in February. In June, the precipitation reaches its peak, with an average of 107 mm | 4.2 inch.

average temperature by month London

With an average of 21.7 °C | 71.1 °F, July is the warmest month. At -5.4 °C | 22.2 °F on average, January is the coldest month of the year.

Weather by month // weather averages London

<>

Avg. Temperature °C (°F) Min. Temperature °C (°F) Max. Temperature °C (°F) Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in) Humidity (%) Rainy days (d) avg. Sun hours (hours)

January February March April May June July August September October November December

Data: 1991 - 2021 Min. Temperature °C (°F), Max. Temperature °C (°F), Precipitation / Rainfall mm (in), Humidity, Rainy days. Data: 1999 - 2019: avg. Sun hours

The precipitation varies 41 mm | 2 inch between the driest month and the wettest month. The variation in annual temperature is around 27.2 °C | 48.9 °F.

The month with the most relative humidity is November (77.44 %). The month with the least relative humidity is April (64.86 %). The wettest month is January (12.90 days), while the driest is September (9.83).

London weather and climate for every month

Airport close to London

The closest Airports of London are: London International Airport (YXU) 9.00km,John C. Munro Hamilton International Airport (YHM) 108.91km,Toronto Pearson International Airport (YYZ) 153.03km

You can reach London from this Cities by Plane: London (LGW), Athens (ATH), Glasgow (GLA), Copenhagen (CPH), Islamabad (ISB), Lahore (LHE), Paris (CDG), Ottawa (YOW), Thunder Bay (YQT), Halifax (YHZ), Beijing (PEK), Ponta Delgada (PDL), Porto (OPO), Havana (HAV), Dallas (DFW), Saskatoon (YXE), Regina (YQR), San Francisco (SFO), Calgary (YYC), Frankfurt am Main (FRA)
